name: City Constructor
description:
FULLSCREEN STRONGLY RECOMMENDED!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Use the Q and E keys or click the arrows at the top of the screen to cycle tiles.
Click to place tile.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Features in the works:
- Background Music
- Path Turns
- Better clouds
- Maybe soe (more) actual logic and functions..?

Update Log:
v1.5c - added day/night cycle, population system, and basic traffic system
v1.41c - added controls to in-game window, added more house variants
v1.4c - added two houses, three trees, flower fields, and replaced manual layering system with automatic layer sorter (released on itch.io)
v1.31c - fixed costume issue
v1.3c - added some flags
v1.2c - added water and shore tiles
v1.1c - added 3-way intersections for roads
v1.0c - initial concept release
